name: SKOverlay.TransitionContext
desc: A context object you can use to animate UI changes while the platform presents or dismisses an overlay.

items.name: func addAnimation(() -> Void)
items.desc: Adds a closure you can use to animate view properties.

items.name: var startFrame: CGRect
items.desc: The size and location of the overlay before the transition.

items.name: var endFrame: CGRect
items.desc: The size and location of the overlay at the end of the transition.
